phrases: Just up ahead, I will defeat Erza...
and become an S Class wizard!
You drew the short straw, huh?
Not like I care, but what is the celebration about?
It is like a festival, Carla!
It is only natural for everyone to celebrate.
It is been about three years since he came back.
So, the entire city was reconstructed with this in mind?!
Right off the bat with that?!
I told you to fight me!
As we have done since days long past,
I will now announce the participants in this year's S Class Wizard Advancement Exam!
Each of your powers, hearts, and souls...
I have judged them all this past year...
Those who are Men should become S Class!
The first trial is a test of might as well as luck.
This is D route, one of the eight possible paths...
I had no idea she was this strong!
You will not be able to become an S Class Wizard like this!
Then you intend to nullify Juvia's water attacks!
But as always, you have trouble with distances.
And that makes you a washout!
What am I here for, a critique?!
she left herself open, even if just for a moment...
Do not make me laugh, Juvia.
When it is two against one, attacking while your foe is busy
responding to your partner's attack is all too obvious.
If I am expecting such an attack, then I am not open at all.
The first time I met you, at the Tower of Heaven,
I sensed you had more drive than this.
I shall give you no quarter, Juvia!
Meanwhile, Lucy and Cana had successfully passed the first trial...
I am back among the living...
You are too sensitive to heat.
We do not have to leave right away.
What is with the leisurely attitude?
Has Natsu's stupidity rubbed off on you recently?
Anyway, I do not want to leave here just yet.
As long as we are here, let us wash our swimsuits!
Little brother or not, I am not going to treat you with kid gloves, Elfman.
I am here too, you know!
I am no good at holding back...
Er, Happy, what the hell are you doing?
Whether my opponent is Gildarts or whoever...
My punch is going to make him cry out, It hurts!
I have not done anything yet!
I am going to show you just how strong I have gotten these past 3 years!
I am not mentally prepared yet...
Do not rush him without thinking!
I just told you I am no good at holding back...
He crushed the ground and used it as a cushion?!
Test or not, you went way overboard...
I do not think he is dead.
That is not the kind of magic it was.
H-He will return to his normal form soon.
But unfortunately, this is the end of the line for you, Natsu.
I have not thrown in the towel yet!
Do not underestimate me just'because I have gone chibi!
I just had a good idea!
This is actually a stroke of luck!
With this many me's, I will be able to beat Gildarts!
This is the first time anyone has dared fight me
Let a guy relax, would ya?
I am going to take you apart!
But I am going to beat that monster!
That kid never learns his lesson.
Still, to keep facing Gildarts, no matter how many times he gets slapped down,
he deserves recognition for his courage.
He deserves recognition for his courage, she says!
Who the hell do you think you are?
You got something to say to me, wench, why not just get it off your chest?!
Do not go acting like you are some kind of mentor!
I will clean the floor with you!
What do you say we check it out?!
Nobody around here has ever heard of an indoor voice!
But you are going to watch it too, are not you, Gray?
You have not even hit him once, Natsu!
Is this all you have got?
You are strong, the strongest in the guild...
You can barely stand up, Natsu...
And that is why I am going to beat you one day, I swear it!
That sounded cool, Natsu, but I think it is iffy at best.
I will not pull my punches either...
And I are not going to lose...
It is an army of Natsus!
Go back to your normal form!
Natsu gave it everything he is got!
And it had no effect whatsoever?!
I moved Gildarts from his original position!
Come to think of it, Gildarts did not take even one step!
On the other hand, he beat you senseless without even taking one step, Natsu!
I have a good sense of your power.
As an examiner, I could pass you right now, but...
Do not give me that crap!
If I cannot defeat you, becoming an S Class Wizard would be pointless!
I figured you would say that.
That is why I are not going to hold back on you.
You walk the path of magic, but to arrive at its summit,
there is something you still need.
I find no fault with you when it comes to standing against me with courage.
However, very few have the courage to sheathe their sword once it is out.
It tells you what your weakness is.
And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.
It is necessary in order to become an S Class Wizard.
That is what you learned today.
The examiner says that you pass.
But the exam is not over yet.
The Master is behind this, so you know an even more arduous test awaits you.
I know you can do it.
And now let me speak to you not as an examiner, but as a good friend...
It is not all about powerful magic...
But I know how you feel, your desire to win...
Age or career has nothing to do with it...
I am the same way, see...
I do not want to lose against you.
I will fight you again, anytime.
Go on, now, and become an S Class Wizard, Natsu.
Come to think of it, it feels like I have not seen Mest for a long time.
They were probably traveling here and there together.
But he was not around in Edolas...
Yeah, now that you mention it...
You must have met him sometime...
For example, there was that time... um...
He probably used magic to make himself fade into the background.
